Thanks for purchase UGUI Crosshair!

- Get Started: 

- Import the UGUI Crosshair package from asset store to your unity project.
- in your game scene where want use the crosshair drag the prefab located in: Assets -> UGUICrosshair -> Content -> Prefabs -> UGUICrosshair* inside your canvas in scene (if not have one yet, create an new one).
- Now you can integrate and set up to your tasted or needed!

For full documentation please unzip the "documentation" file outside of you unity project 
or check the online documentation: http://lovattostudio.com/documentations/ugui-crosshair/

contact:
if you have any problem or question feel free to contact us: 
http://www.lovattostudio.com/en/select-support/
